moves.name: Basic Header
moves.description: Tap to perform a standard header. Time your taps to maintain ball control and possession!

moves.name: Power Header
moves.description: Double tap for a stronger shot. Perfect for long passes or surprising the goalkeeper!

moves.name: Curve Shot
moves.description: Swipe while shooting to bend the ball's trajectory. Essential for scoring around defenders!

moves.name: Skill Chain
moves.description: Combine headers, volleys, and special moves to create unstoppable attacks!

moves.name: Aerial Control
moves.description: Time your jumps perfectly to maintain possession in the air. Extend your control for bonus points!

moves.name: Super Strike
moves.description: Charge up for a powerful shot that blasts past defenders. The ultimate scoring move!
